sense.def:
Down
pomeni proti tlem, niže ali v nižji kraj.

seg.quote: Shall I lift your suitcase down?
The rain came down in sheets.

sense.def:
Besedo
down
uporabljamo z glagoli, kot sta
fall
ali
pull
, če hočemo povedati, da je nekaj uničeno ali pade na tla.

seg.quote: The house fell down a week later.

sense.def:
To put something down
pomeni nekaj nekam dati, da tistega ne držimo več v rokah.

To go down a road
pomeni iti po cesti.

seg.quote: He walked down the road reading a newspaper.
The library is halfway down the street.
Farther down she stopped at the chemist's.

sense.def:
To go down a river
pomeni iti ob reki v smeri rečnega toka.

Down
pogosto pomeni isto kot na jugu ali proti jugu.

seg.quote: There's a man down in Baltimore who does that.

sense.def:
Če količina ali raven nečesa
goes down
, se zmanjša.

seg.quote: Sheila was trying to get her weight down.

sense.def:
Če je nekaj
down on paper
, je zapisano na papir.

seg.quote: That date wasn't down on our news sheet.

sense.def:
To be feeling down
pomeni, da se počutimo nesrečne ali potrte;

Down
so mehka peresca mladih ptičev. Iz njih izdelujemo blazine ali odeje.

Down to a particular detail
pomeni vključujoč vse, tudi najmanjšo podrobnost.

seg.quote: Successful suicides seem to have been planned down to the last detail.

sense.def:
To go down with an illness
ali
to be down with an illness
pomeni imeti neko bolezen;

xr.QF: up and down, ups and downs:
